solution_line_template: Rudy types {rudy_wpm}, Joyce types {joyce_wpm}, Gladys types {gladys_wpm}, Lisa types {lisa_wpm} and Mike types {mike_wpm} so {rudy_wpm}+{joyce_wpm}+{gladys_wpm}+{lisa_wpm}+{mike_wpm} = <<{total_wpm}={total_wpm}>>{total_wpm}
There are {num_employees} team members, so they type at an average speed of {total_wpm}/{num_employees} = <<{total_wpm}/{num_employees}={average_wpm}>>{average_wpm} words per minute
